name: AJNRPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open A. J. N. R. Podcast”
”Alexa, start A. J. N. R. Podcast”
”Alexa, ask A. J. N. R. Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. j. n. r. podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The American Journal of Neuroradiology (AJNR) (www.ajnr.org) is a scholarly, peer-reviewed journal that publishes Original Research papers and Review Articles relevant to the diagnostic, interventional, and functional imaging of the brain, head, neck, spine, and organs of special sense. AJNR's podcasts include Editor's Choices and Fellows' Journal Club selections for each of its issues. Podcasts are edited by Wende Gibbs.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask AJNR Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask AJNR Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
